structure.unit: Sec. 8-2164. - COMPLIANCE WITH FEDERAL AND STATE LAW.

law.catch_line: COMPLIANCE WITH FEDERAL AND STATE LAW.
law.text: The City will comply with the Federal Safe Drinking Water Act, the North Carolina Drinking Water Act, and North Carolina State Building Code, which pertain to water conservation and establish an effective on-going program to control use of public water supply. (Ord. No. 2007-235, ยง1, 5-15-07)
